article: I was really worse off.I had only $10 and even didn't have _ to eat breakfast or pack my own lunch that day.As I _ my son to school,I noticed a man walking up the road.I'd seen him before--elderly,worn,43 _ in whatever rags he could find and _ on a piece of branch as a walking stick. 45 _ I'd always pack two sandwiches in case I saw him or anyone else in need.I also noticed a lady _ fresh fruit cups($5)&fruit bowls($7)on the roadside.I prayed I'd see him when I came back in the _ to go to work.I did,and he was sitting on the bus stop bench right next to the fruit seller! I pulled over,48 _ a bowl of fruit for $7,told her to keep the _ and immediately turned to give the _ to the man.As I jumped back into my car to rush to work,the lady stopped me and gave me a(n) _ fruit bowl! I know she had it hard financially.So I refused but she _ I take it. When I got to work I took a different _ that I don't usually use,which passed my favorite store,so I _ to say good morning to the ladies working there.The ATM was right there,and as I passed,I _ stepped on a $10 bill lying on the ground! I 1ooked around but there was no one who just used the ATM.I asked the girls in the store if they may have _ it and they said no,and told me it was a _ so take it.  Later,during lunchtime,a coworker said she'd brought too much food and _ me half.Another coworker had the same problem so we had a _ feast! You get what you give,and blessings come just when you need it.
